Method Detail

browse

public Category browse(String catId)
                throws IOException,
                       FlickrException,
                       org.json.JSONException
Browse groups for the given category ID. If a null value is passed for the category then the root category is used.

Parameters:
catId - The optional category id. Null value will be ignored.
Returns:
The Collection of Photo objects
Throws:
IOException
FlickrException
org.json.JSONException

getInfo

public Group getInfo(String groupId)
              throws IOException,
                     FlickrException,
                     org.json.JSONException
Get the info for a specified group. This method does not require authentication.

Parameters:
groupId - The group id
Returns:
The Group object
Throws:
org.json.JSONException
IOException
FlickrException

search

public Collection<Group> search(String text,
                                int perPage,
                                int page)
                         throws FlickrException,
                                IOException,
                                org.json.JSONException
Search for groups. 18+ groups will only be returned for authenticated calls where the authenticated user is over 18. This method does not require authentication.

Parameters:
text - The text to search for.
perPage - Number of groups to return per page. If this argument is 0, it defaults to 100. The maximum allowed value is 500.
page - The page of results to return. If this argument is 0, it defaults to 1.
Returns:
A GroupList Object. Only the fields id, name and eighteenplus in the Groups will be set.
Throws:
IOException
FlickrException
org.json.JSONException
